paper_abstract: In this note, two notions of convergence in [0, 1]-topological spaces, previously introduced by Chen and Cheng [Fuzzy sets and Systems 86 (1997) 235-240], and Georgiou and Papadopoulos [Fuzzy Sets and Systems 116 (2000) 385-399], respectively, are proved to be equivalent.
